text: @Mike_Pence How can you brag you "protect the precious lives of the unborn," when you haven't protected the lives of "the born"? 140,000 people have died of Covid19 on your watch; a big percentage of those deaths were preventable, but for the incompetence & ignorance of the Trump Admin.
